name: Learn Georgian
description:
This app helps you to learn Georgian 🇬🇪 basics.

  • Learn the alphabet
  • Learn some words that are useful in day-to-day life
  • You will also practice reading (transcriptions are included)

This game uses several exercises (mini-games) to keep things interesting for you.

This game has 2 built-in languages: English and Russian. You may need to know either of those languages to use this application. I may add more languages later, any help is appreciated (this project is an open source).

I created this app to learn the language myself. I'll be glad if it would turn out to be useful for you as well.

This app should work from some mobile devices as it does support touch controls. It also works with a keyboard and/or mouse, but more importantly, you can use it with your gamepad! 🎮

The levels in the main menu unlock the new letters from the alphabet. It means that exercises may include more letters and words. You start from the first level, get comfortable with the first set of letters, and go to the next level.

Every time you do a new round, you'll get new challenges (they're randomized). Keep repeating the same difficulty level until you feel comfortable and get "flawless victory" reliably.

There are 6 difficulty levels in total. The last level includes all letters and words.

There are 3 modes:

  • Letters-only: limit challenges to the letters only (alphabet)
  • Words-only: limit challenges to the words only (vocab)
  • Mix: it's both modes combined, you'll get everything
